Articles.Content:
I love the little SDK tool called PartLab. It sure beats loading the game to see if your part/texture is looking right.

I have two questions..

Is there a Zoom feature? I've played around punched a lot of keys, but don't seem to be able to zoom.

Is there a way to turn off the grid?

The main reason I am asking is this is the perfect place to take a screenie of your part for publishing purposes.

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

I'll take a look in a sec.

EDIT: Nope, zoom

I suggest you take screenies ingame and then cut them out in photoshop

I'll take a look in a sec.

EDIT: Nope, zoom

I suggest you take screenies ingame and then cut them out in photoshop

It's not quite that practical as you can't get a nice clean shot of, say, a decoupler by itself with nothing attached.
within your own 3d program maybe? Sure, it won't look 100% the same, but people will get the idea.

within your own 3d program maybe? Sure, it won't look 100% the same, but people will get the idea.

I don't have a 3D program I can load the parts in. I do texture work and like to be able to load the part up quick and see if the texture is correct.

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky
Ahhh ok. I could do if for you maybe?

All done! Check out the link in my siggy.

Arrr!

Capt'n Skunky

try blender....

Its free modeling app that will let you load it up and look at it...
